metadata.feature_description: Analytics for idea submissions showing voting patterns and idea popularity

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads with module tabs including Ideas
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel fails to load - displays blank white panel. JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init

issues: Community Analytics dashboard fails to initialize due to JavaScript error: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function. The panel remains blank and no analytics data or tabs are displayed.

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics > Ideas Tab
steps.expected: Ideas tab loads with voting pattern analytics
steps.actual: Cannot access Ideas tab - Community Analytics dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Unable to test voting patterns - Community Analytics dashboard initialization fails with TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics Ideas section to view implementation status
steps.expected: Implementation status metrics displayed for ideas
steps.actual: Cannot access Ideas analytics - Community Analytics dashboard fails to load

issues: Unable to test idea implementation status monitoring - dashboard initialization JavaScript error prevents access

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics Ideas section to view popular ideas ranking
steps.expected: Popular ideas displayed with ranking based on votes/engagement
steps.actual: Cannot access Ideas analytics - Community Analytics dashboard fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Unable to test popular ideas ranking - Community Analytics panel does not render due to utility.serializeCustomDate function error

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics Ideas section to view idea-specific metrics
steps.expected: Detailed metrics for individual ideas displayed
steps.actual: Cannot access Ideas analytics - Community Analytics dashboard initialization fails

issues: Unable to verify idea-specific metrics - dashboard JavaScript error prevents panel from loading

steps.action: Navigate to Community Analytics Ideas section to analyze trends over time
steps.expected: Trend charts and historical data for ideas displayed
steps.actual: Cannot access Ideas analytics - Community Analytics dashboard fails to load with blank panel

issues: Unable to analyze idea trends - Community Analytics dashboard crashes on initialization due to missing utility.serializeCustomDate function

observations: The Community Analytics dashboard menu item exists and is accessible under PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
When clicking on Community Analytics, the panel opens but remains completely blank/white
Console error reveals JavaScript bug: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init (social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025)
This error occurs during dashboard initialization, preventing any analytics content from loading
The bug affects both Site Analytics and Community Analytics dashboards

Code review shows the feature should support Ideas Module Analytics with APIs for GetModuleDashboardInfo, GetModulePopularContent, GetModuleTagStats, etc. but the UI cannot be tested due to the initialization failure
The Ideas Tab and all Ideas-specific analytics features cannot be accessed or verified due to this blocking JavaScript error
